StringTable.Label: Factions_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Αναθέστε σε ηγέτες να συνεργαστούν με διάφορες φατρίες στον πολιτισμό σας, προκειμένου να κερδίσουν την εύνοια και να διαχειρίζονται τις ικανότητές τους.

StringTable.Label: Coming_Soon_Beta_2
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Διαχειριστείτε τους νόμους και τις πολιτικές του πολιτισμού σας.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ALPHA_DESPLAY_STRING
StringTable.String: Έκδοση Λογισμικού Βήτα, μόνο για ελεγκτικούς σκοπούς.

StringTable.Label: BATTLE_VIEWER_DISABLED_MP_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Ο προβολέας μάχης είναι απενεργοποιημένος στο παιχνίδι με πολλαπλούς παίκτες.

StringTable.Label: LOGINTOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Συνδεθείτε για να ενεργοποιήσετε το παιχνίδι με πολλαπλούς παίκτες, τα επιτεύγματα και την υποστήριξη τροποποιήσεων!

StringTable.Label: SHOW_FACTION_IN_MP_OPTION_LABEL
StringTable.String: Εμφάνιση Φατρίας στο Παιχν. Πολ. Παικτών

StringTable.Label: CIVILIZATIONNAMELABEL
StringTable.String: [B]Τράπεζα Δεδομένων[/B][BR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Δείτε τα στατιστικά του πολιτισμού σας.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: VICTORY_CONDITIONS_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Πώς να συντρίψετε τους Αντιπάλους σας

StringTable.Label: Opponents_Slots_Dec
StringTable.String: Επιλέξτε τους αντιπάλους και πιθανούς Συμμάχους που θέλετε να μοιραστείτε το Γαλαξία μαζί.

StringTable.Label: LOBBY_INVITEFRIENDS_NOOVERLAY
StringTable.String: Η Υπηρεσία "Steam Overlay" είναι απενεργοποιημένη για αυτό το παιχνίδι. Παρακαλώ ενεργοποιήστε την για να προσκαλέσετε φίλους.

StringTable.Label: Conquest_Description
StringTable.String: Συντρίψτε τους εχθρούς σας και κυριαρχήσετε το Γαλαξία!

StringTable.Label: Alliance_Description
StringTable.String: Χρησιμοποιήστε τη Διπλωματία για να φέρετε ειρήνη στο Γαλαξία.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Description
StringTable.String: Δεν χρειάζονται μάχες όταν ο πολιτισμός σας είναι ο καλύτερος.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Description
StringTable.String: Ανακτήστε τους Κρυστάλους Ανάληψεως και ανυψωθείτε σε υψηλότερο επίπεδο ύπαρξης.

StringTable.Label: TurnLimit_Description
StringTable.String: Νικήστε τους εχθρούς σας πριν ο χρόνος εξαντληθεί.

StringTable.Label: Prestige_Description
StringTable.String: Οικοδομήστε τη μεγαλύτερη Αυτοκρατορία του Γαλαξία.

StringTable.Label: AllowSurrender_Description
StringTable.String: Οι εθροί σας θα πολεμήσουν μέχρι την τελευταία τους ανάσα.

StringTable.Label: BlindExploration_Description
StringTable.String: Μην εμφανίζετε στο χάρτη άγνωστα άστρα.

StringTable.Label: MegaEvents_Description
StringTable.String: Δεν θα υπάρξουν Σπουδαία Συμβάντα σε Γαλαξιακό Επίπεδο.

StringTable.Label: SuperAbilities_Description
StringTable.String: Οι Παίκτες δεν θα μπορούν να χρησιμοποιήσουν τις Υπερ-Ικανότητες τους.

StringTable.Label: TechBrokering_Description
StringTable.String: Οι Παίκτες μπορούν νε εμπορευτούν μόνο Γνωστές τεχνολογίες.

StringTable.Label: TechTrading_Description
StringTable.String: Οι Παίκτες δεν μπορούν να εμπορευτούν καμμία τεχνολογία.

StringTable.Label: TransferColoniesOnSurrender_Description
StringTable.String: Οι Αποικίες μεταφέρουν την ιδιοκτησία Πλανητών όταν παραδίδονται.

StringTable.Label: NoFOWInTerritory_Description
StringTable.String: Δεν υπάρχει Ομίχλη του Πολέμου εντός των ορίων των συνόρων σας.

StringTable.Label: StartClose_Description
StringTable.String: Ένας άλλος πολιτισμός είναι πολύ πιθανό να ξεκινήσει την πορεία του κοντά σου.

StringTable.Label: StartNearAIPlayer_Description
StringTable.String: Θα αρχίσεις με τουλάχιστο άλλον ένα πολιτισμό στον τομέα σου, εφόσον το επιτρέπει ο χώρος.

StringTable.Label: DistancedFromOtherPlayers_Description
StringTable.String: Ξεκινάς μόνος σε Τομείς μικρότερους του μεσαίου μεγέθους ειδάλλως είναι εγγυημένη η μέγιστη απόσταση από άλλους πολιτισμούς.

StringTable.Label: StartAloneInSector_Description
StringTable.String: Εγγυάται να ξεκινήσει μόνος σε έναν τομέα με την προυπόθεση ότι υπάρχει χώρος να τοποθετηθούν οι άλλοι πολιτισμοί στους άλλους τομείς.

StringTable.Label: RUNSTEAM_TOOLTIP_LABEL
StringTable.String: Η σύνδεση σου απέτυχε. Παρακαλούμε επιβεβαίωσε ότι το Steam τρέχει και είσαι σε διαδικτυακή λειτουργία για να παίξεις.

StringTable.Label: RUNEPIC_TOOLTIP_LABEL
StringTable.String: Η σύνδεση σου επίεκιται ή απέτυχε. Έλεγξε για να δεις άν ένα παράθυρο υπάρχει στο φόντο με την πύλη του Λογαριασμού σου Epic να αναμένει απάντηση.

StringTable.Label: METAVERSE_OFFLINE
StringTable.String: Το Μετασύμπαν είναι αυτή τη στιγμή μη διαθέσιμο. Παρακαλούμε ξαναπροσπάθησε αργότερα.

StringTable.Label: METAVERSE_ONLINE
StringTable.String: Κάνε κύλιση τον δρομέα στο ΜεταΣύμπαν για να δεις τα στατιστικά σου.

StringTable.Label: MODS_OFFLINE
StringTable.String: Ο Διαχειριστής Τροποποιήσεων είναι αυτή τη στιγμή μη διαθέσιμος. Παρακαλούμε προσπάθησε ξανά αργότερα.

StringTable.Label: MODS_ONLINE
StringTable.String: Απέκτησε πρόσβαση στο Μετασύμπαν Τροποποιήσεων μας.

StringTable.Label: MOD_ITEM_REPORT
StringTable.String: Ανέφερε αυτή την Τροποποίηση. Οι Διαχειριστές θα ειδοποιηθούν και θα παρθούν μέτρα ή όχι ανάλογα της εκτίμησης που θα κάνουν.

StringTable.Label: MOD_ITEM_DOWNLOAD
StringTable.String: Κατέβασε την Τροποποίηση στον Υπολογιστή σου.

StringTable.Label: RUNGOG_TOOLTIP_LABEL
StringTable.String: Η σύνδεση σου απέτυχε. Παρακαλούμε επιβεβαιώστε ότι η Υπηρεσία "GOG Galaxy" λειτουργεί και ότι είστε συνδεμένοι με το διαδίκτυο για να παίξετε.

StringTable.Label: LOBBYENTRY_ADDBUTTON_DISABLED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Μόνο ο Οικοδεσπότης μπορεί να προσθέσει παίκτες Τεχνητής Νοημοσύνης.

StringTable.Label: LOBBYENTRY_CLAIMBUTTON_DISABLED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: ’λλοι Παίκτες μπορούν να διεκδικήσουν αυτό τον Πολιτισμό για να παίξουν ως αυτός.

StringTable.Label: LOBBYENTRY_CLAIMBUTTON_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Για να παίξετε ώς αυτός ο Πολιτισμός, διεκδικήστε τον για λογαριασμό σας.

StringTable.Label: OPTIONS_HOOKSENABLED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Επιτρέπει σε εφαρμογές όπως το Raptor της ΑMD και το Shadowplay της NVIDIA να "αγκυστρωθούν" στο Γαλαξιακοί Πολιτισμοί 4 και να καταγράψουν βίντεο ή στιγμιότυπα οθόνης. Ίσως προκαλέσει αστάθεια αν ενεργοποιηθεί.

StringTable.Label: GRAPHICS_CONFIRM_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Να κρατηθούν αυτές οι αλλαγές; Η Οθόνη σας θα κάνει επαναφορά σε %i δευτερόλεπτα.

StringTable.Label: GRAPHICS_RESTART_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Οι επιλογές γραφικών σας θαεπιδράσουν αφότου επανεκκινήσετε το Γαλαξιακοί Πολιτισμοί 4.

StringTable.Label: LANGUAGE_RESTART_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Θα πρέπει να επανεκκινήσετε το Γαλαξιακοί Πολιτισμοί 4 για να επιδράσει η νέα ρύθμιση γλώσσας.

StringTable.Label: OptionNotSupported
StringTable.String: Αυτή η επιλογή δεν υποστηρίζεται από τον υπολογιστή σας.

StringTable.Label: ALFHA_WARNING_BUTTON_LABEL
StringTable.String: Έργο σε εξέλιξη, το΄πιασα - πάμε να παίξουμε τον Διαστημικό Αυτοκράτορα!

StringTable.Label: CHOOSE_HOME_WORLD_TEXT
StringTable.String: Αυτή η φορτηγίδα εκτοξεύεται από ένα ναυπηγείο με πολλαπλούς κόσμους υποστηρικτές. Επιλέξτε τον πατριδόκοσμο του.

StringTable.Label: ExecutiveActions
StringTable.String: Διοικητικές Εντολές[BR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Χρησιμοποίησε τους πόρους του πολιτισμού σου προς άμεσο όφελος.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: COLONY_SORT_CRIME_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Ταξινόμηση με βάση το ποσοστό Εγκλήματος

StringTable.Label: ADMINISTRATION_NOT_ENOUGH_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Χρειάζεστε περισσότερους Διαχειριστές για να φτιάξετε καινούρια αστροβάση.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_ECONOMIC_STIMULUS_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Το να αντλούμε καταναλωτικά αγαθά από τα εργοστάσια μας ενθαρρύνει την οικονομική δραστηριότητα, και κατά συνέπεια την αύξηση του αποθεματικού.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_RESEARCH_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Το να αφιερώνουμε όλες τις παραγωγικές μας εγκαταστάσεις στο σκοπό ενός ιδιαίτερα σημαντικού ερευνητικού προγράμματος αυξάνει ιδιαίτερα την αποδοτικότητα των επιστημόνων μας.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_CULTURAL_FESTIVAL_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Μια πλανητική γιορτή της κουλτούρας μας, αφιερωμένη στη διασπορά της επιρροής μας ανά το γαλαξία.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_BIRTHING_SUBSIDIES_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Μια νέα αποικία συχνά χρειάζεται βοήθεια να αναπτυχθεί. Με το να εκτρέψουμε τους παραγωγικούς μας πόρους στο να βοηθήσουμε οικογένειες να ασφαλίσουν το περιβάλλον τους, βεβαιώνουμε ότι θα αυξηθούν και θα ευημερήσουν.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_JUBILEE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Μια πλανητική γιορτή που προορίζεται να ξαναδώσει ελπίδα στον καταπονημένο πληθυσμό, και να αυξήσει την αποδοχή μας στην αποικία.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_ASSEMBLY_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Τα εργοστάσια είναι κάτι περισσότερο από μέσα παραγωγής΄ είναι οι φωλιές από όπου γεννιόμαστε, και οι μήτρες των μελλοντικών γεννεών.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_MILITARY_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Όταν δεν υπάρχουν Πλανητικά Βελτιωτικά Κτίσματα να οικοδομηθούν ή να αναβαθμιστούν, αυτό επιτρέπει σε μια αποικία να διοχετεύσει όλη την πλεονάζουσα κατασκευή βελτιώσεων στο ναυπηγείο της.

StringTable.Label: PROJECT_MORAL_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Επιτρέπει σε μια αποικία να διοχετεύσει όλη την πλεονάζουσα παραγωγή κτισμάτων στην ενίσχυση του ηθικού του πληθυσμού της μέσω δωρεάν και φθηνότερων αγαθών και υπηρεσιών.

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_LACKS_PROPULSION_MODULE
StringTable.String: Αυτή η Αστροβάση δεν έχει προωθητικό σύστημα.

StringTable.Label: Hypergate_No_Link_Tooltip
StringTable.String: {OBJECTNAME:1} δε συνδέεται με άλλο Υποδιαστημικό ρεύμα.

StringTable.Label: Hypergate_Connections_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Τα ακόλουθα Υποδιαστημικά ρεύματα έχουν σύνδεση με{OBJECTNAME:1}:

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_DEFAULT_CONSTRUCTOR_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Επιλέξτε το Σχέδιο Κατασκευαστικού Σκάφους, τικάρετε αυτό το κυτίο, μετά πατήστε Έτοιμο για να θέσετε το επιλεγμένο σχέδιο ώς βασικό κατασκευαστή για όλες τις νέες Αστροβάσεις.

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_DEFAULT_CONSTRUCTOR_DETAILED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Επιλέξτε το Σχέδιο Κατασκευαστικού Σκάφους, τικάρετε αυτό το κυτίο, μετά πατήστε Έτοιμο για να θέσετε το επιλεγμένο σχέδιο ώς βασικό κατασκευαστή για όλες τις νέες Αστροβάσεις.[BR][BR]Τρέχων Βασικό Σχέδιο: %s

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_AUTOMATE_LABEL
StringTable.String: Παραγγέλονται αυτόματα οι αναβαθμίσεις για εγκατεστημένα τμήματα Αστροβάσεων

StringTable.Label: InvaderRankDescription
StringTable.String: Ο Βαθμός Εισκολής υπολογίζεται από την αποφασιστικότητα των στρατιωτών που εισβάλουν.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_CONFIRM_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Σίγουρα θέλετε να εισβάλετε σε αυτό τον πλανήτη?

StringTable.Label: ATTACKER_SUCCESS_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Καλή δουλειά, η εισβολή σου τα πήγε περίφημα.

StringTable.Label: ATTACKER_FAILURE_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Τα έκανες θάλασσα! Η εισβολή σου απέτυχε.

StringTable.Label: CAN_ONLY_RUSH_SHIPDESIGNS_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Μπορούμε να επισπεύσουμε μόνο σχέδια αστρόπλοιων.

StringTable.Label: RALLY_BUTTON_LABEL
StringTable.String: [B]Πηγαίνετε στο[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Στείλτε το στόλο σε συγκεκριμμένη τοποθεσία.[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Πλήκτρο Πρόσβασης: Δεξί Κλίκ[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Ship_Details_Screen_Title
StringTable.String: Επιλέξτε Επόμενο Σκάφος που θα Ναυπηγηθεί

StringTable.Label: Notification_ChooseResearch_Short
StringTable.String: [B]Έρευνα[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Επέλεξε μια Τεχνολογία για να ερευνήσουν οι Επιστήμονες σου[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Πλήκτρο Πρόσβασης: TAB[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Notification_ColonyIdle_Short
StringTable.String: [B]Αδρανής Κεντρικός Κόσμος[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Επιλέξτε ένα εγχείρημα για τον Κόσμο σας[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Πλήκτρο Πρόσβασης: TAB[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Notification_ShipIdle_Tooltip
StringTable.String: [B]Αδρανές Αστρόπλοιο[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Επιλέξτε ένα σκάφος με το αριστερό πλήκτρο του ποντικιού. Κάντε δεξί κλίκ σε έναν προορισμό για να θέσετε την πορεία του.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Military_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Παραγωγή που χρησιμοποιήται από τα Ναυπηγεία σου για να φτιάξουν πλοία.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Social_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Παραγωγή που χρησιμοποιείται στους Πλανήτες σου για να κατασκευάσουν βελτιώσεις, ή να εργαστούν σε Πλανητικά Εγχειρήματα.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Wealth_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Ποσοστό της Παραγωγής που αφιερώνεται στη δημιουργία Πλανητικού εισοδήματος.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Research_Tooltip
StringTable.String: ποσοστό παραγωγής που αφιερώνεται στην έρευνα νέων τεχνολογιών.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Production_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Ποσοστό Παραγωγής που αφιερώνεται στην κατασκευή βελτιώσεων και σκαφών.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Manufacturing_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Ποσοστό της παραγωγής που χρησιμοποιείται από τα Ναυπηγεία σου για να ναυπηγήσουν αστρόπλοια.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Social_Manufacturing_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Ποσοστό της παραγωγής που χρησιμοποιείται στους Πλανήτες σου για να κτίσουν βελτιώσεις ή να εργαστούν σε Πλανητικά εγχειρήματα.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Research_Icon_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Κύλισε τη μπάρα εδώ για να εστιάσεις στη διερεύνηση νέων τεχνολογιών.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Welth_Icon_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Κύλισε τη μπάρα εδώ για να εστιάσεις στη αποταμίευση Πιστώσεων και τη αύξηση του εισοδήματος.

StringTable.Label: ProductionSubWnd_Manufacturing_Icon_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Κύλισε τη μπάρα για να εστιάσεις στην παραγωγή βελτιώσεων και σκαφών.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOWND_CANCELED_TRADE
StringTable.String: Έχω τελειώσει μαζί σου. Φύγε τώρα.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOWND_PERFORMED_TRADE
StringTable.String: Ευχαρίστηση μου να κάνω δουλείες μαζί σου.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WAITFORTRADE_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Περιμένουμε από % να αποδεχτούν ή να απορρίψουν την εμπορική μας πρόταση...

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_TRADEREQUESTED_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: %s των %s αιτήθηκε σύναψη εμπορικής συμφωνίας μαζί σου. Δέχεσαι?

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_DEAD
StringTable.String: Ένας νεκρός κόσμος, στερούμενος από κάθε ζωή.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_COLONIZABLE
StringTable.String: Ένας κόσμος που μετά βίας υποστηρίζει τη ζωή.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_FANTASTIC
StringTable.String: Πλανήτης αυτής της ποιότητας είναι σπάνιοι.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_UnusableTile
StringTable.String: Δεν μπορείτε να χτίσετε στο πλακίδιο.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_UnusableTerrain
StringTable.String: Το έδαφος σε αυτό το πλακίδιο δεν είναι ακόμη χρησιμοποίησιμο.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_BlockedImpType
StringTable.String: Δεν μπορείτε να χρησιμοποιήσετε αυτό το είδος κτιρίου σε αυτό τον τύπο εδάφους.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_MissingPlanetFeature
StringTable.String: Το κτίριο αυτό δεν έχει το απαιτούμενο είδους χαρακτηριστικό που απαιτείται από το πλακίδιο.

StringTable.Label: BuildError_BlockedPlanetFeature
StringTable.String: Βελτιώσεις δεν μπορούν να οικοδομηθούν σε αυτό τον τύπο του πλακιδίου.

StringTable.Label: SpecialImpLISTBOXTITLE
StringTable.String: Σύρετε για να τοποθετήσετε μοναδικά κτίσματα βελτιώσεων

StringTable.Label: LevelPreviewOptionTooltip
StringTable.String: Τι επίπεδο χρειάζεται για προεπισκόπιση όταν το κτίσμα δεν έχει επίπεδο. Αν τίθεται στο 0, το επίπεδο δεν θα προεπισκοπείται.

StringTable.Label: APPROVAL_TOOLTIP_YELLOW_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=Yellow]Το επίπεδο Αποδοχής στον πλανήτη είναι μέτριο, που προκαλεί αρνητικές επιδράσεις στον πληθυσμό. Για να αυξήσετε το επίπεδο αποδοχής, μετατρέψετε κάποιους πολίτες σε Διασκεδαστές, και χτίστε περισσότερα κτίρια Αποδοχής ή τμήματα Αστροβάσεων.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: APPROVAL_TOOLTIP_RED_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Το επίπεδο Αποδοχής είναι επικίνδυνα χαμηλό, που αποβαίνει στη μείωση της αποτελεσματικότητας του πλανήτη, καθιστώντας τον τρωτό σε ξένη επιρροή. Για να αυξήσεις την Επιρροή, χτίσε βελτιωτικά κτίσματα ή τα αντίστοιχα τμήματα Αστροβάσεων.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_YELLOW_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=Yellow]Με τον τρέχοντα ρυθμό αύξησης, ο πληθυσμός του πλανήτη θα υπερβεί σύντομα την παρεχόμενη τροφή. Χτίσε περισσότερα Κτίσματα Παροχής Τροφής για να διασφαλίσεις συνεχή αύξηση.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_RED_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Ο πληθυσμός σε αυτό τον πλανήτη περιορίζεται επειδή δεν υπάρχουν αρκετά σπίτια. Κατασκεύασε οικιστικές περιοχές για να αυξήσεις τη χωρητικότητα του πληθυσμού σου.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_BLACK_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Δεν υπάρχει αρκετό φαγητό στον πολιτισμό σου για να διατηρήσει τον πληθυσμό του πλανήτη. ’υξησε την ποσότητα του εισερχόμενου φαγητού για να αντιμετωπίσεις αυτή την έλλειψη.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_YELLOW_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=Yellow]Μια εξωτερική δύναμη έχει τώρα επικίνδυνο επίπεδο Επιρροής στον πλανήτη. Για να αποφύγεις την επανάσταση, χτίσε περισσότερα κτίσματα Επιρροής και Αντίστασης.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_RED_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Η Εξωτερική Επιρροή σε αυτό τον πλανήτη έχει γίνει γίνει τόσο ισχυρή που ο πληθυσμός έχει αρχίσει να εξεγείρεται, και ο πλανήτης σύντομα θα αποστατήσει. Για να καταστείλεις την ερχόμενη επανάσταση, φτάξε κτίσματα Επιρροής, ή αφαίρεσε από το σκηνικό κοντινές αλλόκοσμες Αστροβάσεις η/και Πλανήτες.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_RED_NOTIFICATION_TEXT_FOREIGN_PLANET
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Foreign Influence on this world has become so high that the population has begun to rebel.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Turn_Limit_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: The player with the highest average percentage will win the game if no other victory type has been achieved.

StringTable.Label: Conquest_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Prove your military superiority by destroying or forcing the surrender of all the major Civilizations in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Conquest_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You must defeat %i remaining Civilizations to achieve a conquest victory.

StringTable.Label: Tech_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Earn the keys to a higher plane of existence by unlocking the ultimate technologies.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Capture and study Precursor Ascension Crystals to learn the secret to ascending to a higher level of existence.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You have %i of the %i Aura points required to achieve an ascension victory.

StringTable.Label: Ascension_Requirement_2_Label
StringTable.String: You must control the majority of Ascension Crystals in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Diplomatic_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Form a permanent alliance with all remaining major Civilizations, and bring true peace to the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Diplomatic_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: You must ally with %i more Civilizations to achieve an alliance victory.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Convince the United Planets to elect you Supreme Leader of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: Approximately %i%% of the United Planets' Civilizations are currently willing to vote for you as Supreme Leader.

StringTable.Label: United_Planets_Requirement_2_Label
StringTable.String: %i Major Civilizations have defied the U.P. and must be destroyed to achieve a United Planets Victory.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Victory_Text
StringTable.String: Spread your cultural influence throughout %i%% of the galaxy, and become the unquestioned dominate culture.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Requirement_1_Label
StringTable.String: Your cultural influence must still gain control of %i%% of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Influence_Requirement_2_Label
StringTable.String: You must hold control for %i more [HS=HS_Week]Months[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Influence_Requirement_3_Label
StringTable.String: At peace with all major Civilizations

StringTable.Label: PEER_TO_PEER_CONNECTION_FAILED_NO_RIGHTS_TO_APP

StringTable.Label: PEER_TO_PEER_CONNECTION_FAILED_DESTINATION_NOT_LOGGED_IN

StringTable.Label: DXDiagErrorBelowMinColorDepth

Installed video drivers must support Microsoft DirectX 10.1, which means you should try to have a driver from at least 2013 installed. Reported driver date: %s

StringTable.Label: PageFileDisabled

StringTable.Label: OutreachTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Benevolent civilizations believe that they can peacefully explore and colonize the galaxy, and Outreach gives them the tools they need to do it.

StringTable.Label: AffinityTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Through a profound affinity with their people and the Civilizations they encounter, benevolent Civilizations can avoid almost all internal strife.

StringTable.Label: ProminenceTier_Dec
StringTable.String: Persuasion is one of the primary ways a benevolent Civilization uses to resolve conflict with others and even expand their influence throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: EnlightenmentTier_Dec
StringTable.String: The Enlightenment of its citizens is always helpful to a benevolent Civilization, helping them keep ahead of the less tolerant Civilizations of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: STARTUP_DESCRIPTION_DEFAULT
StringTable.String: The Drengin Empire is one of the older Civilizations in the galaxy, having survived and thrived over the millennia thanks to their unceasing brutality. Not mindlessly evil, as many Civilizations have discovered to their dismay, the Drengin are exceedingly clever and inventive in their application of evil. There are few ways to enslave or devour an alien that the Drengin haven't thought up.[BR][BR]Following the Dread Lord Wars, the Drengin were forced to put down an internal rebellion by a Civilization of Drengin called the Korath. That done, though not without cost, they remain one of the dominant species in the galaxy, along with their uneasy allies, the Yor.

StringTable.Label: STARTUP_TRAITSDESCRIPTION_DEFAULT
StringTable.String: Drengin soldiers are savagely effective in ground-based combat, and their naval vessels are famously tough. Their military manufacturing ability is also impressive, but Drengin colonies do sometimes struggle with discontent. Much of their famous inventiveness is put into stopping slaveling revolts.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: We've been attacked. We don't know by who, or what they want, but they're here. They want us dead. They want our land and our resources. We have to stop them, or lose everything.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: We've been attacked. We don't know by who, or what they want, but they're here. They want us dead. They want our land and our resources. We have to stop them, or lose everything.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_02_Description
StringTable.String: Our counter-offensive has begun. We attack their quadrant of space. Everything we have is headed there, and we want you to command our forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_02_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: Our counter-offensive has begun. We attack their quadrant of space. Everything we have is headed there, and we want you to command our forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_03_Description
StringTable.String: We're hearing news of an attack on our home worlds. Stop them at all costs.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_01_Scenario_03_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: We're hearing news of an attack on our home worlds. Stop them at all costs.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_02_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: Simple standalone scenario to try your hand at defeating difficult forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_02_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: Simple standalone scenario to try your hand at defeating difficult forces.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_03_Scenario_01_Description
StringTable.String: This is a long battle against multiple enemies in a large map. Actually, it isn't any of these things.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_03_Scenario_01_ShortDescription
StringTable.String: This is a long battle against multiple enemies in a large map. Actually, it isn't any of these things.

StringTable.String: Game must have 2+ players with at least one player not on the same team as other players, and all humans must click Ready.

StringTable.String: Does this game require a password?

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN_NOHUMANPLAYER_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: No human players available for this scenario.

StringTable.Label: CONVENTIONAL_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: This is war in its purest form, two forces fighting it out, often one-on-one in the streets. Not the easiest way to take a planet, but often the only way.

StringTable.Label: INFORMATION_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Very expensive, but useful if you want to preserve a planet intact and with a surviving population to keep things running.

StringTable.Label: BIOLOGICAL_WARFARE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: When you only want the infrastructure but not all those troublesome inhabitants.

StringTable.Label: PLANETARY_BOMBARDMENT_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Hurtling nearby asteroids onto the planet surface weakens resolve but will result in an unhappy population later. However, it is relatively inexpensive.

StringTable.Label: TIDAL_DISRUPTION_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: This very expensive option does less damage and stuns the remaining population into submission.

StringTable.Label: CORE_DETONATION_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Expensive alternative to planetary bombardment, leaves population shell shocked and submissive afterwards but results in massive planetary damage.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Aggressive
StringTable.String: They tend to look for excuses to go to war. Be careful.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Peaceful
StringTable.String: More likely to select a moderate response to diplomatic slights; and emphasize things in common to promote harmony.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Cruel
StringTable.String: Tendency to pick on weaker civilizations, and cares less about cultural animosity.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Expansionist
StringTable.String: Prioritizes opportunities to expand their empire.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Greedy
StringTable.String: Prioritizes opportunities to increase their treasury by any means.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Opportunistic
StringTable.String: If they see weakness, they will take advantage of the opportunity.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Cultural
StringTable.String: Values things that increase their influence in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Spiritual
StringTable.String: Places increased importance on ideological choices.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Totalitarianism
StringTable.String: Believes in absolute power and control by the state, with all aspects of public and private life under the governance of a single authority.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Nihilism
StringTable.String: Believes in the rejection or denial of inherent meaning or value in life, often extending to concepts such as morality, religion, and purpose.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Collectivism
StringTable.String: Believes in prioritizing the collective good of multi-species societies, star systems, or entire sectors, often emphasizing shared responsibility and collective action in galactic affairs.

StringTable.Label: PePersonalityType_Desc_Progressivism
StringTable.String: Believes in the relentless pursuit of technological advancement and societal reform, often with a focus on universal equality across species and planetary systems.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Egalitarianism
StringTable.String: Believes in the fundamental equality of all sentient beings, advocating for equal rights and opportunities regardless of species, origin planet, or other characteristics.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Traditionalism
StringTable.String: Believes in the importance of preserving established customs, practices, and institutions and views societal change with caution.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Individualism
StringTable.String: Believes in the primacy of individual rights, personal freedom, and self-reliance, often over the needs and interests of the community or society.

StringTable.Label: PersonalityType_Desc_Pacifism
StringTable.String: Believes in opposing war and violence, advocating for the resolution of conflicts through peaceful negotiations and mutual respect.

StringTable.Label: AIPriority_Desc_Diplomacy
StringTable.String: Non-war interactions with other Civilizations and the United Planets.

StringTable.Label: AIPriority_Desc_Influence
StringTable.String: Expansion of ZOC and cultural takeover.

StringTable.Label: AIPriority_Desc_Logistics

StringTable.Label: Ship_Behavior_Label
StringTable.String: Ship Role determines how this ship will behave in combat, and how it will interact with other ships in your fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Capital
StringTable.String: In battle, capital ships are the steel heart of your fleet. They will target any ship that comes in range, with the primary goal of cutting to the heart of the enemy fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Escort
StringTable.String: In battle, escorts will try to defend high-value ships like capital and support ships. If they have no assets to defend, they will target enemy ships, preferring medium threat ships like assault craft.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Assault
StringTable.String: In battle, assault craft are your sword. Their goal is to dive into the heart of a battle and take out the high-value, high-threat targets, such as capital ships.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Bomber
StringTable.String: In battle, assault craft are your sword. Their goal is to dive into the heart of a battle and take out the high-value, high-threat targets, such as capital ships.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Interceptor
StringTable.String: In battle, interceptors will try to seek out and destroy high-value, low fortitude targets, with the primary goal of taking out enemy support ships as quickly as possible.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Guardian
StringTable.String: In battle, guardians will try to defend low fortitude, high-value targets such as support ships. They will never surrender this duty as long as their charges remain.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Support
StringTable.String: In battle, support ships will attempt to stay out of combat. If armed, they will target any nearby threats, with a preference for low fortitude targets such as interceptors.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Starbase
StringTable.String: Starbases stay put and attempt to fight off any threats.

StringTable.Label: Tooltip_Upgrading
StringTable.String: Upgrading ships will stay put and attempt to fight off any threats.

StringTable.Label: RUSH_REQUIREMENTS_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Spend resources to instantly finish current construction.

StringTable.Label: AI_DIFFICULTIES_RESET_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: All AI have been set to the %s difficulty.

StringTable.Label: GalaxyViewZoomLevel_ToolTip
StringTable.String: When to transition star clusters into more simplified information in galactic view.

StringTable.Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Growth comes from the non-synthetic citizens on your world. But it can be increased by improvements like Fertility Clinics and Hospitals and significantly decreased on worlds with high pollution.

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_COLONY_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Influence controls how far your borders spread. Once borders collide, low Influence worlds may culture flip to the control of a civilization with higher Influence.

StringTable.Label: INFLUENCE_TOOLTIP_STARBASE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Build Influence modules on this starbase to help grow its influence more quickly.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_CLASS_TOOLTIP_BOTTOM_TEXT
StringTable.String: Build Terraforming improvements on this planet to increase planet class.

StringTable.Label: SAVE_DISABLED_MOVING
StringTable.String: Please wait until ship movement, battle, invasion, and colonization are resolved.

StringTable.Label: SAVE_LOAD_EXIT_DISABLED_AI_RUNNING
StringTable.String: Please wait for the other players turns to finish.

StringTable.Label: LOAD_DISABLED_MULTIPLAYER
StringTable.String: To restore a multiplayer session, go to Multiplayer from the Main Menu and select 'Restore Session'.

StringTable.Label: CIVILIZATIONCAPITAL_TOOLTIP_DEC
StringTable.String: The heart of your civilization, its growth and its power.

StringTable.Label: CanSupplySocial_Value
StringTable.String: Hauls refined goods to another colony providing %ld manufacturing points.

StringTable.Label: CanSupplyMilitary_Value
StringTable.String: Hauls refined goods to another shipyard providing %ld manufacturing points.

StringTable.Label: CUSTOM_FACTION_WND_EDIT_SAVE_FAILED_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Unable to save the custom Civilization file. Please make sure you are able to create files in your Documents/My Games/GalCiv4/Factions folder.

StringTable.Label: TECHAGE_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Each technology provides the needed infrastructure to allow your civilization to progress towards the next technological age.

StringTable.Label: CONVERSATION_POPUP_MINOR_TITLE
StringTable.String: A Minor Civilization Has Contacted Us

StringTable.Label: MOVE_FLEET_OUT_OF_RANGE
StringTable.String: This destination is outside the fleet's range.

StringTable.Label: MOVE_SHIPYARD_OUT_OF_RANGE
StringTable.String: This destination is outside the shipyard's range.

StringTable.Label: MOVE_STARBASE_OUT_OF_RANGE
StringTable.String: This destination is outside the starbase's range.

StringTable.String: Destroying %s will also make the planet unusable for future colonization. Are you sure you want to do this?

StringTable.Label: GovernPlanetWnd_CantDestroy_Tooltip
StringTable.String: You cannot destroy your last colony.

StringTable.Label: RETIRE_MP_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: You cannot retire from multiplayer games. You may click Main Menu or Exit to allow the AI to assume control instead.

StringTable.Label: RETIRE_CONFIRM_MSG
StringTable.String: Retiring will cause you to forfeit the game. Are you sure you want to retire?

StringTable.Label: DURANTIUM_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Enormously strong and pliable, Durantium is required for most orbital improvements.

StringTable.Label: PROMETHION_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Promethion is a requirement for many advanced planetary improvements. Thanks to its bizarre quantum nature, existing in multiple realities at the same time, Promethion is a necessary ingredient in any well-equipped lab.

StringTable.Label: THULIUM_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Thulium possesses an unusual ability to vary its density, making it incredibly valuable for kinetic weapons, as well as a prized building material.

StringTable.Label: ELERIUM_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: The massive amounts of energy needed for advanced beam weapons require specialized Elerium crystals to safely channel.

StringTable.Label: ANTIMATTER_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: One of the most reliable high-density sources of energy in the galaxy, Antimatter is used in both power generation systems and advanced missile platforms.

StringTable.Label: CULTURE_RELIC_TOOLTIP_DESC_MSG
StringTable.String: Culture Relics increase colony and starbase influence growth.

StringTable.Label: ECONOMIC_RELIC_TOOLTIP_DESC_MSG
StringTable.String: Economic Relics increase colony gross income.

StringTable.Label: STARBASE_EFFECTS_AVAILABLE_COLONY_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Build an Economic or Cultural Ring to start applying bonuses to this colony.

StringTable.Label: EJECTMODE_CHOOSEDESTINATION
StringTable.String: Right-click a destination, or ctrl-select more ships

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_SURVEY_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Survey[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Will attempt to find and go to anomalies.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_AUTOCOLONIZE_TEXT

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_EXPLORE_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Explore[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Will attempt to clear the fog of war.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_SENTRY_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Sentry[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Order the ship to remain here (skipping its turns). It will only reactivate if an enemy ship comes within sensor range.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_STANDBY_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Standby[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Order the ship to remain here (skipping its turns). It will remain inactive and unresponsive until told otherwise.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_REPAIR_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Repair[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Will gain a repair speed boost, and notify you when it is back to full strength.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MAINGAME_AGENT_NO_FACTION
StringTable.String: No Civilizations to spy on yet

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_NONE
StringTable.String: We know very little about the inner workings of this civilization.[BR][BR]Assign spies to learn more about their economy and start stealing technologies.

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_LOW
StringTable.String: Our spies have begun to collect information on both the Civilization and the economies of its colonies.[BR]We've also made initial contact with their lower level scientists who may be willing to 'share' their findings and technologies with us.

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_MEDIUM
StringTable.String: Our spies have worked further into government and corporate bureaucracy, providing more detailed information on the state of their economy.[BR]Their scientists now speak freely with our agents, increasing how quickly we acquire their technology.

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_HIGH
StringTable.String: We have deep knowledge of their forces and economy.[BR]Our spies have free access to their top research facilities and pass their latest advancements to us.

StringTable.Label: ESPIONAGE_LEVEL_DESC_ULTRA
StringTable.String: We know them as well as they know themselves.[BR]Some of our spies are regarded as leading scientists and thinkers and freely pass secrets to us.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_ADVANTAGE_TOOLTIP_PLAYER_MUCH_MORE_POWERFUL
StringTable.String: You have a battle advantage of %lu vs. %lu. Your soldiers are significantly more powerful than your enemy.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_ADVANTAGE_TOOLTIP_PLAYER_IS_ALOT_WEAKER
StringTable.String: You have a battle advantage of %lu vs. %lu. Your enemy's troops are significantly more powerful than yours. If retreat is still an option, you may want to consider it.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_ADVANTAGE_TOOLTIP_PLAYER_IS_WEAKER
StringTable.String: You have a battle advantage of %lu vs. %lu. Your enemy's troops are stronger than yours, so victory is uncertain.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_INVADING_LEGIONS
StringTable.String: The Legions of the invading forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_INVADING_GENERAL
StringTable.String: The General overseeing the invading forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_DEFENDING_GENERAL
StringTable.String: The General overseeing the defending forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_DEFENDING_LEGIONS
StringTable.String: The Legions of the defending forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_INVADING_SOLDIERS
StringTable.String: The number of invading soldiers (every legion represents 50,000 soldiers).

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_DEFENDING_SOLDIERS
StringTable.String: The number of the defending soldiers (every legion represents 50,000 soldiers).

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_SOLDIERING_YOURINVADING
StringTable.String: When engaging enemy forces, your troops will attack with +%lu%% strength.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_SOLDIERING_YOUHAVENONE
StringTable.String: Soldiering gives the invading forces a boost to their strength. Your troops do not receive a Soldiering bonus.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_SOLDIERING_ENEMYINVADING
StringTable.String: In this battle, enemy troops will attack at +%lu%% strength.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_SOLDIERING_ENEMYHAVENONE
StringTable.String: Soldiering gives the invading forces a boost to their strength. Your enemy does not receive Soldiering bonuses.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_YOURINVADING
StringTable.String: Once the invasion begins, your troops will get a +%lu%% strength boost when engaged with enemy forces.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_YOUHAVENONE
StringTable.String: Planetary Resistance traditionally gives the defending forces a boost to their strength. But your planet has no Resistance. Perhaps you should do something about that...

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_ENEMYINVADING
StringTable.String: Planetary Resistance gives the defending forces a +%lu%% strength boost.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_ENEMYHAVENONE
StringTable.String: Planetary Resistance traditionally gives the defending forces a boost to their strength. Luckilly, this planet has none, which will making the invasion somewhat easier.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_RESISTANCE_ENEMYNULLIFIED
StringTable.String: Planetary Resistance traditionally gives the defending forces a boost to their strength. Our chosen invasion strategy - %s - will fully nullify enemy resistance bonuses.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TACTIC_UNKNOWN
StringTable.String: Unknown Invasion Tactic - research further up the Tech Tree to unlock this attack strategy.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_TECH_ADVANTAGE_PLAYERLEADS
StringTable.String: 'Tech Advantage' is a boost to the strength of an army based on a civilization's progress down a tech tree. Your forces currently have an advantage of %lu to %lu over your enemy.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_TECH_ADVANTAGE_ENEMYLEADS
StringTable.String: 'Tech Advantage' is a boost to the strength of an army based on a civilization's progress down a tech tree. Your enemy is technologically superior, commanding an advantage of %lu to %lu over your troops.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_TECH_ADVANTAGE_EQUAL
StringTable.String: 'Tech Advantage' is a boost to the strength of an army based on a civilization's progress down a tech tree. Both you and your enemy are equally matched in this area.

StringTable.Label: INVASION_TOOLTIP_POPULATION
StringTable.String: The civilian population of the planet being invaded. Based on the Tactics used, this invasion may result in civilian casualties.

StringTable.Label: ReviewSecondRequest
StringTable.String: The development team here at Stardock works hard to make the best game possible, and your feedback is very important to that process. We would love to hear from you. You can reach out to us on the community forums or email us directly with any feedback you have at [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]{VALUE}[/COLOR].[BR][BR]Your review of the game is also incredibly important. User review score helps determine where the game will be featured in the store, if it will be seen by one hundred players, or one million. It is how the game finds new players and grows. If you haven't reviewed the game yet, please leave a review. If you have already left a review, thank you.[BR][BR]Thank you for playing Galactic Civilizations IV.

StringTable.Label: Leaders_Diplomats_Dec

StringTable.Label: Shipyard_Text_Top_Right
StringTable.String: Large[BR][BR]Advanced Hyperdrive (x2)[BR][BR]Bio Enhanced Targeting Module (x2)[BR][BR]Plasma Torch (x2)[BR]Long Range Ion beam (x1)[BR]Stinger torpedoes (x1)[BR]Railgun (x1)[BR]Shield Systems (3x)[BR]Durantium Plate (x2)

StringTable.Label: Shipyard_Text_Bottom_Right
StringTable.String: Destroyer[BR][BR]A Destroyer is an efficient and and reliable cruiser that is able to both take and dish out considerable damage. It slow speed makes it better suited for defending planets and large scale invasions than running down pirates.

StringTable.Label: ThinkTank_Mode_Dec
StringTable.String: Assign leaders to a Faction to make the most of their skills.

StringTable.Label: CANNOT_RUSH_NOCONTROL
StringTable.String: You do not have enough Control.

StringTable.Label: SEIZE_GOODS_DEC
StringTable.String: This is a planetary control action that will give us credits, but anger our citizens. Think of it as aggressive taxation.

StringTable.Label: IdeologicalLeaningsTitleDec
StringTable.String: Our policies need to reflect our civilization's culture to be effective.

StringTable.Label: IdeologicalTaxDec
StringTable.String: Adjusting your [HS=HS_Taxes]Tax Rate[/HS] affects [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS], but can hurt your [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Ideology_Screen_Focus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our focus will modify our Ideology.

StringTable.Label: Ideology_Screen_Summary_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our citizens have their own ideologies, and their approval will be affected by our civilizations' ideology as well as the ideology of the governor of their world.

StringTable.Label: IdeologyProgressivism_Balanced_Description
StringTable.String: We shouldn't commit to any ideology at this time.

StringTable.Label: IdeologyProgressivism_Power_Description
StringTable.String: Our people need to be led as one to achieve great things.

StringTable.Label: IdeologyProgressivism_Freedom_Description
StringTable.String: Our people will flourish most when they keep the freedom to do so.

StringTable.Label: IdeologyProgressivism_Equality_Description
StringTable.String: We can be a powerful resource for the good of all of our people.

StringTable.Label: IdeologyProgressivism_Opportunity_Description
StringTable.String: The great among us can help our people excel.

StringTable.Label: IDEOLOGY_ALREADY_BOUGHT
StringTable.String: You have already unlocked this ideology.

StringTable.Label: ENFORCE_LAW_DESC
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight][B]Enforce Law[/B][/COLOR][BR]Force a police action to crack down on crime across the planet.[BR][BR]-50 Control[BR]Remove 3-15% Crime

StringTable.Label: SEIZE_GOODS_DESC
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight][B]Seize Goods[/B][/COLOR][BR]Claiming citizen goods is great for our treasury, but unappreciated by our citizens.[BR][BR]-4 Control[BR]+200 Credits[BR]-3% Approval for 40 turns

StringTable.Label: FESTIVAL_DESC
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight][B]Festival[/B][/COLOR][BR]A planetwide festival will distract our citizens from other concerns.[BR][BR]-2 Control[BR]-400 Credits[BR]+8% Approval for 20 turns[BR]+1% Crime

StringTable.Label: QUELL_PROTEST_DESC
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight][B]Quell Protest[/B][/COLOR][BR]With enough control, protests can be broken by force.[BR][BR]-10 Control[BR]Halts all protests[BR]+10% Approval for 10 turns

StringTable.Label: Drones_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Drones are required to unlock new technologies.

StringTable.Label: Modules_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Modules are required to upgrade your starbases.

StringTable.Label: Nanobots_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Nanobots are required to unlock new technologies.

StringTable.Label: Race_Random_Dec
StringTable.String: Citizens can be of any species in the galaxy, with all of their strengths and weaknesses.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_HYPERGATE_DESC
StringTable.String: Your ship settles into a holding pattern just outside the Stream's maximum horizon. Automatically your ship begins scanning it, detecting the current state of its many energy manifolds. Hypergates must be prodded in just the right way so that a journey through it doesn't deposit a traveler into their own stomach. Satisfied with the numbers, you direct the computers to initiate the rupture sequence...

StringTable.Label: FIRST_HYPERLANE_DESC
StringTable.String: The preparations are complete, and with a visible throb, the Streams link. Travel times between the two endpoints will now be greatly reduced. In one stroke, the unfathomable vastness of space has become a little smaller. A little more civilized.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_ARTIFACT_POWER_USED_DESC
StringTable.String: This galaxy has been the home of alien intelligence for billions of years. More things have been invented and forgotten than we have ever learned. But not this. This... whatever this is... will be ours. You issue the command and energy begins to flow through it.

StringTable.Label: MARKET_NO_RESOURCES_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Market has no resources to buy.

StringTable.Label: MARKET_BLOCKED_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: We need to research Universal Translator to trade with the [HS=HS_Bazaar]Galactic Bazaar[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MARKET_NOT_YOUR_TURN_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Cannot trade resources unless it's your turn.

StringTable.Label: Error_No_Peace_During_Dogpile
StringTable.String: No peace while 'Against the Tide' is active.

StringTable.Label: Error_Cannot_Speak_To_Minor_At_War

StringTable.Label: Error_PermanentWar
StringTable.String: You are at permanent war with this faction and cannot trade with them or ask for peace.

StringTable.Label: Setup_Government_Text
StringTable.String: Choose the starting government of your Civilization. Your Government determines what Cabinet Post are available for assignment. New Governments can be researched in the Govern Branch of the tech tree.

StringTable.Label: Government_Description_Text
StringTable.String: Democracy allows for efficient governing of smaller more socially minded civilizations. But can be cumbersome when the civilization grows larger, or when wars break out.

StringTable.Label: GOVERNMT_CHANGE_TURNS_COUNTDOWN
StringTable.String: {AMOUNT} turns until you can change government types.

StringTable.Label: GOVERNMT_CHANGE_TURN_COUNTDOWN
StringTable.String: {AMOUNT} turn until you can change government types.

StringTable.Label: GOVERNMENT_CHANGE_APPROVAL_NEEDED
StringTable.String: Approval too low. Needs to be at least {AMOUNT} to change to this form of government.

StringTable.Label: ERROR_OUT_OF_FACTION_DATA_STORAGE
StringTable.String: Insufficient faction data storage. Cannot add any new factions.

StringTable.Label: Election_Dialog_Title_Win
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG} votes to confirm the {GOVERNMENTNAME:2} government.

StringTable.Label: Election_Dialog_Title_Lose
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG} votes no confidence in {GOVERNMENTNAME:1} government.

StringTable.Label: Election_Dialog_Description_Win
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG} voted in favor of the current government with {AMOUNT:1}% of the popular vote.

StringTable.Label: Election_Dialog_Description_Lose
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME} lost popular support today for the {GOVERNMENTNAME:1} government, garnering a sad {AMOUNT:1}% of the votes, and the Senate has setup the {GOVERNMENTNAME:2} government.

StringTable.Label: GovernmentalNameDec
StringTable.String: Interstellar Republics allow for efficient governing of small and medium-sized, socially-minded civilizations. By decentralizing colonies, they are enabled to make some decisions more quickly than would otherwise be possible.

StringTable.Label: MilitaryShipsOnlyLabel
StringTable.String: [ICON=Crisis_Icon] Crisis: Can only build Military ships

StringTable.Label: Notification_EmptyPolicySlot_short
StringTable.String: [B]Empty Policy Slot[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Choose a new policy for your civilization[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Hotkey: TAB[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GreedTrait4b_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All trade route now bring back contraband in addition to Credits.

StringTable.Label: GreedTrait4b_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of creative management, our traders have been able to begin importing valuable contraband from foreign worlds, most often without our trade partners noticing.

StringTable.Label: CHANGE_GOVERNMENT_CONFIRM_MSG
StringTable.String: Once changed, you will have to wait {VALUE} months before you can change it again. Are you sure?

StringTable.Label: NotEnoughColoniesFormat
StringTable.String: Own at least {VALUE} Colonies to start modifying your government.

StringTable.Label: SelectGovernmentBeforeLeaving
StringTable.String: Please select a Government and press "Change Government" to choose your starting Government.

StringTable.Label: NoGovernmentLabel
StringTable.String: You have not selected a form of Government yet.

StringTable.Label: GovernmentExtrasTooltip_ColonyLimit
StringTable.String: Number of colonies this government can support before global approval starts being penalized.

StringTable.Label: Market_No_Resources
StringTable.String: No resources are currently available in the Galactic Marketplace.

StringTable.Label: Market_No_Resources_To_Sell
StringTable.String: Your Civilization has no resources available to sell in the Galactic Marketplace.

StringTable.Label: CrisisManagerUnlockTooltip
StringTable.String: Unlock assigning a crisis manager by successfully completing a crisis.

StringTable.Label: RerollTechDesc
StringTable.String: Get a new selection of technologies. Increases research time by 10%.

StringTable.Label: RerollTechOutOfRerolls
StringTable.String: Complete researching a technology before you can be inspired again.

StringTable.Label: ConfirmBuildAsteroidMiningBaseDesc
StringTable.String: Would you like to build a mining base in this asteroid cluster?

StringTable.Label: CannotBuildAsteroidBaseOutsideZOC
StringTable.String: Asteroid cluster must be inside your ZOC in order to be able to build a mining base on it

StringTable.Label: ScienceAdvisor_Base
StringTable.String: There are multiple research opportunities open to us. We should prioritize those that benefit the growth of our citizens and the exploration of space.

StringTable.Label: ScienceAdvisor_AtWar
StringTable.String: Wars may be won on the battlefield, but they are fought in the research lab. We should prioritize research that supports our military efforts.

StringTable.Label: ScienceAdvisor_Income
StringTable.String: Our economy is lagging. We should research technologies that will improve our income or consider increasing our tax rate.

StringTable.Label: ScienceAdvisor_Approval
StringTable.String: Our citizens are unhappy. researching new forms of entertainment will appease them, for a time.

StringTable.Label: ScienceAdvisor_Translator
StringTable.String: We should research Universal Translator so that we can communicate with other species in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AssignTechnologyMinister
StringTable.String: Assign a Technology Minister to unlock

StringTable.Label: PlanetWndInstructionsTip
StringTable.String: Click on a region tile to improve it with a District.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAdvisor_EnemyStrong
StringTable.String: We are past the point of words, violence is all that is left. But I urge caution, they mean to wipe us out and they have the power to do it.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAdvisor_EnemyWeak
StringTable.String: There is no point is wasting words on such a pathetic civilization. We are right to pursue war against them.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAdvisor_Friendly
StringTable.String: Friendship grows between our people. Though the universe is full of threats here we have an opportunity for trade and prosperity.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAdvisor_Foreign
StringTable.String: There are varied and conflicting rumors about them. I recommend we proceed with caution, and the backing of a well armed fleet.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAdvisor_InfluenceStrong
StringTable.String: Our citizens envy their culture. Though they seem like friends, their influence on our people can be as real as a military threat.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAdvisor_TechStrong
StringTable.String: Their advanced technology is the envy of our scientists and military alike. We should boost our research or risk becoming obsolete.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAdvisor_MilitaryStrong
StringTable.String: Their empire is forged on the strength of their fleets. We should avoid war with them, but there are other ways to compete.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAdvisor_NoThreat
StringTable.String: They pose no real threat to us. Which is a good trait in a potential ally.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Anomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Anomalies represent a wide range of stellar phenomena. They may be the remains of ancient civilizations, aberrations in space or simply lost cargo. Only Survey Ships can analyze and collect what the anomaly offers.

StringTable.Label: Concept_ArmorRating_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor protects ships from Kinetic attacks.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Awakening_Dec
StringTable.String: Awakening is a measure of the notice of precursors and other ancient entities. As it grows expect to see their influence and threat grow as well.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Bazaar_Dec
StringTable.String: The Galactic Bazaar allows us to buy and sell resources from the galactic marketplace. Prices will fluctuate over time and new resources may become available, or be removed from the market.

StringTable.Label: Concept_BeamWeapon_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons do moderate damage for a reason Manufacturing cost. They are weak against ships with strong Shields.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Chaos_Dec
StringTable.String: Chaos is a measure of the destabilization of order. As it increases expect to see the threat from pirates and criminal elements across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Concept_ColonyUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital improvements can be used to improve your planets and provide a wide variety of bonuses. Some upgrades are only usable on certain planet types.

StringTable.Label: Concept_CoreWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Assign a [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS] to a world to make it into a Core World.[BR][BR]Core Worlds can build [HS=HS_Improvement]Improvements[/HS] and require Transport ships to [HS=HS_Siege]Invade[/HS] them. They also gather all the [HS=HS_NaturalResources]Natural Resources[/HS] from surrounding colonies.[BR][BR]But, be careful which worlds you choose as Core Worlds. Those with a low planet class or poor resources may be better left as colonies.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Credit_Dec
StringTable.String: Credits represent the amount of funds in your treasury. You can earn them in a variety of ways but the most powerful tool is by adjusting your [HS=HS_Taxes]Tax Rate[/HS]. They are spent maintaining your empire as well as in trade deals with other civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Emporium_Dec
StringTable.String: The Endless Emporium is a movement that some of your citizens follow. They believe in free trade unregulated by laws or governments is in the best interests of consumers and sellers. Boosting your favor with them will increase the Approval of your citizens that follow them.

StringTable.Label: Concept_FinancialDistrict_Dec
StringTable.String: Financial Districts can be built on your worlds to increase the [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] of that world.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Government_Dec
StringTable.String: Governments can up upgraded with the Call Election [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS]. Doing so provides bonuses to your civilization, including unlocking more [HS=HS_PolicySlot]Policy Slot's[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Concept_HousingDistrict_Dec
StringTable.String: Housing Districts can be built on your worlds to increase the amount of citizens that can live there. If a world's population hits the maximum capacity then no new citizens will be created on that world and citizens will complain about overcrowding.

StringTable.Label: Concept_HullSize_Dec
StringTable.String: Hull size determines a ships base [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] and the amount of slots available for ship components like weapons and defenses. The available ship sizes are: Tiny, Small, Medium, Large and Huge.[BR][BR]Cargo hulls are a special hull size that is generally used for non-military ships.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Ideology_Dec
StringTable.String: Ideology is a measure of your civilization values. From Authoritarian to Liberal, and from Equality to Opportunity. Civilizations, leaders and citizens can all have their own ideology, and citizens are happiest when their governor's and civilization's ideology matches their own.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Improvement_Dec
StringTable.String: Improvements can be built on your [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS]. They represent significant construction on that world and can provide a range of bonus. There are several types of Improvements:[BR][BR][ICON=Approval_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS][BR][BR][ICON=Stat_Food_Icon] [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS][BR][BR][ICON=Stat_Influence_Icon] [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS][BR][BR][ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS][BR][BR][ICON=Stat_Military_Power_Icon] [HS=HS_Military]Military[/HS][BR][BR][ICON=Stat_Population_Icon] [HS=HS_Population]Population[/HS][BR][BR][ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS][BR][BR][ICON=Stat_Tourism_Income_Icon] [HS=HS_Tourism]Tourism[/HS][BR][BR][ICON=Stat_Economic_Power_Icon] [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Wealth[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Concept_Instability_Dec
StringTable.String: Instability is a measure of deterioration of the boundaries between dimensions. As it increases expect to see space monsters and dimensional threats become more prevalent.

StringTable.Label: Concept_KineticWeapon_Dec
StringTable.String: Kinetic weapons are powerful but have a high Manufacturing cost. They are weak against ships with a high Armor Rating.

StringTable.Label: Concept_ManufacturedGoods_Dec
StringTable.String: Manufactured Goods are resources that you can produce from your shipyard. Resources like Starbase Modules that are used to upgrade your Starbases.

StringTable.Label: Concept_MilitaryShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Military Ships are the backbone of your army. Their capability, size, offensive and defensive power depend on the technologies your civilization had when they were built. Be sure to invest in your civilizations [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] as well because these more advanced ships will have a higher construction cost.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Minister_Dec
StringTable.String: Ministers are leaders assigned to specific Ministry positions. They provide bonuses to your entire civilization based on their stats and the position they are assigned to.[BR][BR]For example, having a Minister of Technology unlocks an additional technology slot on the Research screen and provides a Research bonus based on that Minister's Intelligence.

StringTable.Label: Concept_MissileWeapon_Dec
StringTable.String: Missile weapons can be used to attack at range. They are not terribly accurate and have a long reload time but they have the advantage of first strike.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Mission_Dec
StringTable.String: Missions are available [HS=HS_Project]Projects[/HS] from your shipyard that allow commercial interests within your civilization to use your shipyard. In return they share a portion of their work with your civilization. They can result in more Credits, Research, or a wide variety of other bonuses.

StringTable.Label: Concept_NaturalLeague_Dec
StringTable.String: The Natural League is a movement that some of your citizens follow. They believe in the sanctity of organic life, and that cybernetics or inorganic life are an abomination and a threat to the existence of real life in the universe. Boosting your favor with them will increase the Approval of your citizens that follow them.

StringTable.Label: Concept_NaturalResources_Dec
StringTable.String: Planets' natural resources are divided into:[BR][ICON=Stat_Minerals_Icon]Minerals- Boosts [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS].[BR][ICON=Stat_Technology_Icon]Technology- Boosts [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS].[BR][ICON=Stat_Wealth_Icon]Wealth- Boosts [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS].[BR][ICON=Stat_Fertility_Icon]Farming- Provides [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS].[BR][ICON=Stat_PlanetInfluence_Icon]Planetary Influence- Boosts [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS].[BR][BR]Colonies send these resources to the closest Core World while Core Worlds keep their natural resources and can boost them with specialized citizens and improvements.

StringTable.Label: Concept_PointDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Evasion makes our ship more likely to dodge an enemy attack.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Policy_Dec
StringTable.String: Policies represent the mandates of your civilization. Known policies are those your civilization has access to due to your civilization traits or have unlocked by researching technologies. You can assign as many policies as you have available [HS=HS_PolicySlot]Policy Slots[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Concept_Prestige_Dec
StringTable.String: Prestige is a measure of a civilization's status. A civilization with a high enough Prestige will win the game through domination in several areas.[BR][BR]Prestige can be earned by completing Galactic Challenges, and taken from your enemies by capturing their worlds or otherwise dismantling their sources of Prestige.

StringTable.Label: Concept_PromethionBorn_Dec
StringTable.String: Promethion Born citizens contribute 0.4 [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] per month plus an additional 0.006 Growth per Promethion their civilization has stored.[BR][BR]With 100 Promethion stored they have the same Growth rate as other species (1 per month). With about 266 Promethion stored they would have double the Growth rate of other species. With no Promethion stored they will just have their base of 0.4 Growth per month.

StringTable.Label: Concept_OnyxHiveGrowth_Dec
StringTable.String: Silicon citizens contribute 0.4 [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] per month plus an additional 0.006 Growth per Promethion their civilization has stored.[BR][BR]With 100 Promethion stored they have the same Growth rate as other species (1 per month). With about 266 Promethion stored they would have double the Growth rate of other species. With no Promethion stored they will just have their base of 0.4 Growth per month.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Project_Dec
StringTable.String: Available projects cover a wide range of things you can construct from your Shipyards. Most commonly this will be [HS=HS_ShipDesign]Ships[/HS] of various types but they could also include [HS=HS_Mission]Missions[/HS] or [HS=HS_ManufacturedGoods]Manufactured Goods[/HS]. Are you unlock more technologies more projects of all types will become available.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Prototype_Dec
StringTable.String: Prototype ships are unique and powerful ships that can be built at your Shipyard. But be careful with them, once they are destroyed they are lost forever.

StringTable.Label: Concept_RecreationalDistrict_Dec
StringTable.String: Recreational Districts can be built on your worlds to increase the [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] of the citizens that live there. Beware though that every Recreational District also increases the world's [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Concept_ShipDesign_Dec
StringTable.String: There are a wide variety of ships you can construct in your Shipyard from specialty ships like Constructors and Colony ships to powerful Military ships. More ships become available as you unlock more advanced technologies, as well as having upgraded weapons and defenses.

StringTable.Label: Concept_ShipUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Whenever an upgradeable ship gains a level an upgrade can be added to it. Some of these are available to all ships, some require special resources and others are unique items that can only be found through missions and events.

StringTable.Label: Concept_ShieldStrength_Dec
StringTable.String: Shields protect ships from Beam weapon attacks.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Siege_Dec
StringTable.String: It takes several [HS=HS_Week]Months[/HS] to capture a world. This gives the attacking and defending civilizations time to bring in reinforcements and respond to the attack.[BR][BR]Colonies can be besieged by any military ship. The time to capture them is based on the attack of the attacking fleet.[BR][BR]Core Worlds can only be besieged by Transports. Time to capture them is based on the [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS] of the [HS=HS_Soldier]Soldiers[/HS] on the Transport and the Soldiering skill of the attacking civilization.[BR][BR]In either case, the Resolve of the citizens on the planet and the defenses of the planet will make the Siege last longer. No matter how strong the attacker a Siege will also take a few Months. And no matter how strong the defender a siege will eventually succeed unless the attacking fleet is destroyed.

StringTable.Label: Concept_SpecialtyShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Specialty Ships cover a wide range of non-military functions. Colony Ships are used to colonize new worlds, Constructors build starbases, Probes explore the universe and Freighters establish trade routes with other civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Concept_StrategicResource_Dec
StringTable.String: Strategic resources are needed to build a wide variety of advanced improvements and ship upgrades. They are:[BR][ICON=Stat_Durantium_Icon][HS=HS_Durantium]Durantium[/HS][BR][ICON=Stat_Thulium_Icon][HS=HS_Thulium]Thulium[/HS][BR][ICON=Stat_Elerium_Icon][HS=HS_Elerium]Elerium[/HS][BR][ICON=Stat_Promethion_Icon][HS=HS_Promethion]Promethion[/HS][BR][ICON=Stat_Antimatter_Icon][HS=HS_Antimatter]Antimatter[/HS][BR][BR]They can be collected by building starbases within range of them in space. Or they can be purchased from the [HS=HS_Bazaar]Galactic Bazaar[/HS] or traded from other civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Taxes_Dec
StringTable.String: Your Tax Rate determines what percentage of your world's [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] goes into the government treasury. The higher it is, the more [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] will be earned per month. But, raising it makes your citizens unhappy.[BR][BR]You can modify your Tax Rate on the Policy screen.

StringTable.Label: Concept_UnitedPlanets_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets is a coalition of the galaxy's civilizations brought together to enact a common framework and common law without overly impacting the freedoms and sovereignty of the members.[BR][BR]The United Planets hasn't been implemented yet. You are free to use this Galactic Achievement at any time.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Warforged_Dec
StringTable.String: The Warforged is a movement that some of your citizens follow. They believe that war is inevitable and our place in the galaxy will be determined by success on the battlefield. Boosting your favor with them will increase the Approval of your citizens that follow them.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Week_Dec
StringTable.String: Each turn represents a month of game time.

StringTable.Label: Concept_Leaders_Dec
StringTable.String: Leaders are specialized citizens that can hold ministry positions, serve as diplomats and govern colonies.

StringTable.Label: Concept_ExecutiveOrders_Dec
StringTable.String: Executive orders allow you to exert control over your government for immediate political benefits.

StringTable.Label: Concept_IdeologyAwareness_Dec
StringTable.String: Raise your Cultural Awareness to reduce the amount of Culture points needed to pick its corresponding Culture Trait.

StringTable.Label: FillterHistoryText
StringTable.String: The Festron civilization rose to prominence when they developed the technologies required for them to thrive and grow on their Dying Planet. However, dealing with these challenges made them very complacent with the pollution they will are comfortable with on their colonies. [BR][BR]The long list of Enemies Killed by the Derek Paxton on his rise to power, has left him with an Iron Grip on his military, that he often uses to Control and Intimidate his less cooperative citizens.[BR][BR]Primarily interested in exploring space, so that they can Meet New Species, in the hopes to gain knowledge and more important assets and resources that they can use to build their ravenous economy.
